Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bo he 薄荷：頭痛頭風，眼目咽喉口齒諸病，小兒驚熱及瘰癧 瘡疥，為要藥 , “It is an essential medication [for curing] headaches and head wind, all types of diseases of the eyes, the throat, the mouth, and the teeth , fright heat in children, scrofula with pervasion-illness, as well as sores and jie -illness”.
